page.title: 04The local Girl Guides
page.content: Laceby Guides meet at 7.30pm on Friday evenings.Our meeting opens with everyone forming a "horseshoe" and three girls going out to raise the Union Jack,our flag.The we talk about events which have happened or plan future activities.We go into groups to work for badges.Some badges are First Aid.Animal Lover,Cooking and Birdwatching.When we reached a certain standard we are tested then we get our badge.As well as this we go to camp.This year we are going to Humberstone for a week.At the end of the evening we form our "horseshoe"again and we lower the flag.Then we sing our guide song called "Taps".
